item.description:
For those that couldn't make August 1st and/or want to check out the sights (art and other delights!) again, we'll be heading to the MFA for sundowners, snacks and more:

During the summer (July & August) the MFA hosts their "MFASummerFridays" every Friday evening from 5:30-9:30pm. Wonderful art inside, mellow music outside in the Courtyard, sundowners from the cash bar and the entertaining company and conversation of many of Boston's culturally aware singles are what you will find at this event.

For additional information, see the MFA web-site at: MFA Summer Fridays

Meet up at the MFA entrance at 6:00pm, or find us inside the MFA thereafter.

Please RSVP a firm Yes or No by Friday mid-afternoon so that the Organizer knows roughly how many / who to expect at the event.

For those who RSVP Yes: If you would like a cellphone contact number to make it easier to meet up / coordinate on the day, let me know and I will e-mail you accordingly.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the MFA entrance at 6pm / find us inside the MFA thereafter
item.name: Summer Friday at the MFA - Sundowners, Art & Singles -Take Two!
